short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brown, pink, and white noise generator to help concentration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some research has shown that brown noise helps with concentration, and some studies indicate white or pink noise may also be beneficial. There is also some research that listening to noise can help some with ADHD symptoms.

This extension will generate Brown, Pink or White noise in the background.

This extension is for entertainment purpose only, and makes no medical claims.

- https://acamh.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1111/j.1469-7610.2007.01749.x
- https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0965229918309683
- https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2022/09/23/well/mind/brown-noise.html
